name: Tooth-N-Claw
languages: understands Infernal but can't speak it

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: Tooth-N-Claw has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Tooth-N-Claw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) cold damage.

actions.name: Freezing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Tooth-N-Claw exhales an icy blast in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6 damage) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
